description: Founded in 2008 and run entirely by artists, Celluloid VFX delivers top-class visual effects for the Hollywood industry and for the local German market.  Since the very beginning Celluloid VFX has prided itself on technical expertise and know-how as well as a deep and profound understanding of the visual esthetics of a well composed vfx shot.
company_name: Celluloid Visual Effects GmbH & Co. KG
specialities: Creation of visual effects for film, commercial and television

description:
unu creates the perfect mobility solution that connects the people with their city.

The unu founders, Elias Atahi and Pascal Blum came to the same conclusion: in order to get the most out of a city, urban mobility is key. They returned home from Asia with a visionary idea in their minds.

unu developed the smart electric scooter that is all about cities, enabling everybody to embrace the full potential of their own urban environment. Available in a range of body and trim colours, the battery-powered scooter has a plush leather saddle with room for a pillion passenger. The Berlin based team’s emphasis on simplicity goes beyond unu’s attractive design, offering customer-friendly doorstep delivery, direct insurance plans in selected countries and a service partnership with Bosch and DHL in the logistics sector.

The battery case allows for easy portability and recharging at any standard plug. Ensures that the environmentally compatible vehicle is never running on empty. It’s thoughtful features like this that make the unu an electric scooter that is ready to go the extra mile.

unumotors.com 
embrace urban life

Cinemo is a global leader in automotive grade multimedia playback, streaming, media management and connectivity middleware in the embedded world. CPU and Operating System agnostic as well as highly optimized for low power and low footprint devices, Cinemo's unified middleware solutions decode, play, render, stream, manage and index virtually any file, disc, connected device and streaming format. 

Designed and optimized for the high quality requirements of the automotive industry, Cinemoâ€™s solutions can be seamlessly integrated into entry, mid and high automotive / in-vehicle infotainment system head and rear seat units, as well as automotive Apps enabling powerful new use cases.

Cinemo GmbH is a privately held German Corporation, headquartered in Karlsruhe, Germany. With a dedicated and strong engineering team, Cinemo's technologies represent the best in their class.

For more information, please visit www.cinemo.com
specialities: High-performance and automotive-grade multimedia playback, streaming, media management and connectivity middleware.

description:
Wir sind ein Team aus erfahrenen Ingenieuren, Technikern und spezialisierten Fachkräften, das Dienstleistungen rund um die Entwicklung, Beratung, Konstruktion und Fertigung anbietet.
Unsere Projektingenieure und Konstrukteure, Softwareanwender, Hardwarespezialisten und unsere Projektmanager erarbeiten individuelle und effiziente Lösungen für die Aufgaben und Visionen unterschiedlichster Branchen.
Unsere Kernkompetenzen sind in der Automotive- und Nutzfahrzeugbranche gebündelt. Aber auch im Maschinen- und Anlagenbau bis hin zur Medizintechnik und Konsumgüterindustrie gehören wir zu den Top-Anbietern kreativer durchdachter Engineering-Dienstleistungen in Deutschland.

Ever since its managing director Dr. Ulrich Lages founded Ibeo Automotive Systems GmbH in 1998, a steadily growing workforce has embraced his vision. 

Today 45 employees are engaged in refining laser scanners and thus fostering the company's success and its pursuit of accident-free motoring. This development has enabled Ibeo to establish worldwide technological leadership in the laser scanner segment with the protection of more than 80 patents. It has also promoted the widespread acceptance of laser technology in the automotive industry. 

Outstanding laser scanning and software technology have lead to ADAS (advanced driver assistance systems) and HAD (highly automated driving) systems that generate real-time knowledge of the current driving situation and can suggest specific actions or perform specific actions. 

Ibeo Reference products facilitate the ADAS development process by providing a benchmark reference for third-party ADAS systems. Real world scenarios are being generated using high definition laser scanners and Ibeo Evaluation Suite software. This leads to object tracking, lane mark detection and curb stone detection. 

With several exceptional projects Ibeo Automotive tries to set the bar higher to achieve better results. 

The mission of integrating laser scanners in cars remains the drive force of the Ibeo team to make driving more safe and comfortable.
specialities: Development of outdoor laser scanners to make driving more safe and comfortable
Developing reference systems for third-party ADAS systems

description:
Founded by Udo Künzler in 1994 and headquartered in Karlsbad in Southern Germany, GLP (German Light Products GmbH) is a leading manufacturer of cutting edge lighting technology equipment and remains at the forefront of LED technology within the entertainment lighting sector.

The company’s award-winning X4 series has become a standard around the world, specified by top LDs for its versatile and packed feature set. Constantly expanding its product range, GLP is committed to bringing environmentally friendly lighting technology to designers without expecting them to compromise in their artistic expectations.

In 2009, GLP purchased the German video company G-LEC and increased its global presence by establishing a subsidiary in Los Angeles, USA, and in Hong Kong the following year. Entering the current decade GLP continued to expand its horizons by setting up a new Nordic office, based in Sweden.

http://www.cs-group.de/impressum.html

C&S group GmbH, stands for communication & systems group, is a spin-off of a former research entity at the University Ostfalia in Wolfenbüttel, Germany. We enjoy an international appreciation, not only as independent testing company, but also as competent partner for the analysis and conception of automotive networked systems and their testability.

As accredited test house according to ISO17025, we conduct conformance and interoperability tests for HW components of different customer specific and standardized IVN protocols such as CAN, LIN, FlexRay. Following the E/E architectures’ trends we are expanding our services to cover the emerging protocols CAN FD and BroadR-Reach automotive Ethernet.

Furthermore C&S offers testing solutions and consultancy services for SW modules, supporting the migration to AUTOSAR compliant architectures as well as integration tests of BSW stacks.
Our long-lasting testing experiences are also applied in our consulting services for the conception and safeguarding of the proper operability of networked systems.
We participate in standard-setting organizations like ISO, SAE, FlexRay, LIN, AUTOSAR, OPEN, etc. C&S is represented by partners in Europe, Japan and the US.

Exit Games develops Photon which is the #1 network engine for the development of realtime, multiplayer, cross platform games, chat & voice.

Photon is used by more than 135,000 developers and includes companies like Square Enix, Codemasters, KranX, Fishlabs, Nival, Bigpoint, Walt Disney, Taito, Konami and World Golf Tour to create online games and applications.

INFITEC GmbH is a technology company located in Gerstetten, a result of a research project of Daimler in 1999, to overcome the problem of developing fatigue due to long working hours while using 3D glasses. The result of this very successful project was patented as Interference Filter Technology, which created a new standard on the market for 3D visualization systems. During more than a decade of expertise and research, INFITEC held partnership with many companies known for excellence in research and simulation labs around the globe, and received various positive feedbacks on many advantages of the technology, such as:
• No Ghosting
• No Fatigue
• No Special Screen Required
• No Hotspots
• Robust passive glasses

To know more about our solutions, please visit: www.infitec.net

Impressum: www.infitec.net

carhs.training offers a training program for automotive engineers that is unique in Europe. It covers everything from standardized courses to custom in-house seminars to complete educational programs, along with symposia, conferences and congresses for special areas of automotive safety and product development.

The TrainingCenter from carhs.training now offers more than 70 standardized courses with well-known instructors. They come out of industry, higher education, state institutions and research, and are proven experts for their respective fields. Our clientele includes automotive manufacturers and suppliers all over the world. A large part of our courses are also offered in English.

Our annual congress SafetyUpdate and its companion trade fair SafetyExpo, both part of the SafetyWeek, are also firmly established.

Our areas of specialization:

 - Passive and active vehicle safety
 - Driver assistance systems
 - CAE methods and processes
 - Virtual product development


Imprint: https://www.carhs.de/en/carhs-imprint.html

We are an independent vehicle manufacturer and also specialised in the upgrading of high-class cars from the VW group - with special focus on the Audi model line. All development services are performed by us together with Wetec GmbH, the in-house service provider for development.

Wir sind eigenständiger Fahrzeughersteller und als Veredelungsspezialist auf höherwertige Fahrzeuge  des VW-Konzerns spezialisiert - unser Hauptaugenmerk legen wir auf die Audi Modellpalette.
Alle Entwicklungsleistungen werden von uns gemeinsam mit unserem unabhängigen Entwicklungsdienstleister Wetec GmbH, Wettstetten durchgeführt.

We at CarJump love car sharing! Founded in the vibrant heart of Berlin we are here to make carsharing available for everyone. With the CarJump app users can reserve and book cars across several car sharing providers like DriveNow, Car2Go, Multicity and more – individually, flexible and all within one app.

Adess AG is devoted to designing, building and developing racing cars and motorcycles, high-performance cars and electric vehicles of the highest standards.

Adess AG designers work to the demanding standards required by the motoracing industry, with our engineers using their experience and expertise. Additional resources and partners ensure the ongoing support for our customers at all levels of motorsport.

Adess AG is engaged in an increasing number of high-end technologies consultancy projects, always involving a continuous drive for the ultimate in performance by innovation and clever solutions. The needs of the customer, including high levels of component quality and design, timely delivery of successful projects and cost efficiency, remain our highest priority.

itsmy.TV is a Munich, Germany, based game developer for HbbTV Games and the leading RedButton gaming network for Connected TVs in Europe. 

Already 100+ free to play family-, party- and TV show related games incl. top titles like, Seven Dash™, Blobbys Zauber Mine™, itsmy Poker™ and itsmy Sweethearts™ are available for all Smart TV viewers.

The cloud service offers players instant game play, multiplayer fun and social functions like friending, 1vs1 battles, party mode and tournaments. 

And of course, the most requested feature: watching TV while playing with friends, 

Access: Red Button @ Pro7, Sat1, Puls4, kabel1, RTL2, multithek, KabelKiosk and many more TV Stations in Europe. 

Access via Smart TV Portals from TV and Set-Top-Box manufacturers like TechniSat, HD Plus, smartPORTAL, isio, VideoWeb, Medion, Vestel, Humax and others.

The games which are played with the remote control and or with connected devices like Smartphones and Tablets are developed in CEHMTL and HTML5.

We <3 JavaScript Gamedevelopers. Join us! 

itsmy's mission is to connect all Smart TVs as one gaming network.

Join us. 
love itsmy.tv


itsmy is a registered trademark of Gofresh GmbH
company_name: itsmy.TV - the (Hbb)TV Cloud Gaming Network for all RedButton enabled Smart TVs

description: PDR-Team specializes in paintless dent repair (PDR) and offers complete solutions to car dealerships and insurance companies alike. We take care of everything from logistics and repairs acceptance to dealing with the customers' concerns and every step in between.

Stagelink, the fan-powered tour promoter, helps artists and their managers engage their fans and efficiently promote their shows. On stagelink.com, artists can track their fan-driven, real-time demand to plan and pre-finance risk-free tours, as well as reach highly engaged audiences to build a community and to promote their shows.

Ticketmaster is a Live Nation Entertainment, Inc company.

About Live Nation

Live Nation Entertainment is the world’s leading live entertainment and ecommerce company, comprised of four market leaders: Ticketmaster, Live Nation Concerts, Artist Nation and Live Nation Network. Ticketmaster is the global event ticketing leader and one of the world’s top five ecommerce sites, with a database of over 119 million fans who visit our sites. Live Nation Concerts produces 22,000 shows annually for more than 2,300 artists globally. Artist Nation is the world’s top artist management company, representing over 200 artists. These businesses power Live Nation Network, the leading provider of entertainment marketing solutions, enabling nearly 800 advertisers to tap into the 250 million consumers Live Nation delivers annually through its live event and digital platforms. In Germany, Ticketmaster GmbH has more than 60 employees in the Berlin headquarters and offices in Hamburg, Munich and Frankfurt.

For additional information, visit www.livenation.com/investors.

Rational Motion provide engineering solutions for vehicle integration, in the fields of:
- Hybrid and electric power train development
- Real-time embedded system design and verification
- Control systems development and rapid control prototyping
- Safety conception and design
- Vehicle electrical systems design

ASAM (Association for Standardization of Automation and Measuring Systems) coordinates the development of technical standards in the automotive industry. The standard portfolio ranges from Calibration, Measurement, Diagnostics and Networks of ECUs to Software Development to Test Automation to Data Management and Analysis. The standards are developed by experts from ASAM member companies. Members are international OEMs, Tier-1 suppliers, tool vendors and universities. It is estimated that approx. 80% of all cars worldwide are using ASAM technology and that a great number of OEMs apply ASAM standards in their processes.  To learn more about ASAM, visit www.asam.net

Die H.T.P. Motorsport GmbH wurde im Jahr 2012 als Nachfolger der Heico Motorsport GmbH gegründet. H.T.P war seit Beginn des GT-Engagements von Heico als Partner und Förderer mit in das GT3 Projekt eingebunden.

Die sportliche Leitung der personell unveränderten Mannschaft der GT-Sparte hat weiterhin Norbert Brückner, Entdecker und Förderer des DTM-Rekordchampions Bernd Schneider, inne. Norbert Brückner besitzt jahrzehntelange Erfahrung im Kart-, Formel- und Tourenwagensport. Er ist unbestritten eine der führenden Persönlichkeiten im deutschen und europäischen Motorsport was die Gebiete Fahrerscouting und – entwicklung betrifft. Sein Wissen und sein Know-how werden auf und neben der Rennstrecke von allen Teams, Fahrern und Motorsportinteressierten anerkannt und geschätzt.

Heico Motorsport engagierte sich seit 2011 unter der sportlichen Leitung von Norbert Brückner in verschiedenen nationalen und internationalen GT-Rennserien.

H.T.P. Motorsport knüpfte nahtlos an die Erfolge von Heico an und erreichte in 2013 das absolute Top-Level im GT3 Sport.

- Sieger 24 h Spa-Francorchamps 2013
- Sieger 1000 km Nürburgring 2013
- Fahrermeisterschaft und 2. Platz Blancpain Endurance Series 2013
- Team- und Fahrermeisterschaft ProAm Fia GT Series 2013
- 3. Platz Einzelmeisterschaft ADAC GT Masters 2013
- 2 Siege Hauptrennen FIA GT Series 2013 und 5 Klassensiege FIA GT Series 2013
- 1 Sieg ADAC GT Masters 2013 und insgesamt 7 Podiumsplätze ADAC GT Masters 2013
- Team-Meisterschaft GT3 Europe 2011 und 2012
- Fahrermeisterschaft GT3 Europe 2012
- 3. Platz 24 h Nürburgring 2012
- 2. und 3. Platz 24h Dubai 2012
- 1. Sieg eines Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT3 in der ADAC GT Masters 2011
 

Darüber hinaus wurden weitere Siege, Podiumsplatzierungen und vordere Positionen in verschiedenen GT-Rennserien errungen.

artlogic provides flexible, experienced and technically proficient crew for concerts (rock, pop, opera, classical, etc), shows, trade fairs, corporate events, private parties, exhibitions, TV shows and all other types of event, whether indoors or outdoors!

Customers benefit from our simple management process, excellent logistics and our qualified and motivated personnel. We react quickly and we can be contracted 24 hours, 7 days a week. 
 
The heart of our business is based on a web-based intranet which provides you the customer with an overview of your current/ongoing projects at any time. Our network stretches across Germany and we are able to serve  most parts of Europe through a network of affiliated partner offices. We send to your desired location exactly the crew you need. This gives every customer the flexibility they need in order to cut down on any unnecessary expenses. 
 
Take advantage from our nationwide network for your job. 
 
artlogic - our network on your job

German Autolabs is a Berlin-based technology startup developing IoT (internet-of-things) solutions. We are working on the world´s first digital co-driver to make the driving experience more pleasant, safe and human.

We are a team of automotive experts, experienced entrepreneurs and developers utilizing state of the art software technologies, interaction methods and artificial intelligence with an overview from product design and consumer marketing specialists. Our founders Holger G. Weiss (former CEO at Aupeo) and Patrick Weissert (former Director Consumer at HERE) bring over 30+ years of experience centered on the Automotive & Connected Car industry. 

Together we are building cutting-edge solutions and services that will shape the mobility of the future.

Consulting of Private Equity and Industrial Firms (primarily automotive and machine tool sector) and Governmental Investors or Lenders     

Consulting activities in the due course of M&A activities in international automotive and machinery companies. Providing in depth knowledge of the specific technologies, customers, suppliers and business processes. Supporting private equity and strategic investors in their investment or divestment business and identifying investment opportunities. Supporting companies in Interim Management positions and as Non-Executive Board Director in due course or independently. Focus on Europe, North America, Turkey, UAE, India, Pakistan, China, Malaysia and Indonesia.
	
•	Interim Management service with official responsibilities primarily machinery and automotive sector
•	Providing advice for finance investors and strategic investors (automotive an machinery)
•	Consulting/identifying investment opportunities and carrying out technological and business (DD)
